title: Diploma in MS PowerPoint 2013 Basic
headline: Learn Microsoft PowerPoint 2013 Basic with this free online course.
description: In this free online course, Microsoft PowerPoint 2013 basic, you will learn how to create and present a basic slideshow presentation. Students will learn about performing an advanced text edit. The course also teaches students how to add graphics, tables, and charts to their PowerPoint presentation. So, why wait? Start this course today and learn about the basics of Microsoft PowerPoint.
courseDescription:
This course, MS PowerPoint 2013 Basic, will provide you with an understanding of the interface as well as basic tools and skills used to create a presentation in Microsoft PowerPoint. You will be able to explain how navigate the PowerPoint interface. You will also learn about how to create and save a PowerPoint presentation. You will learn how to build a presentation by selecting a presentation type, and editing the text in PowerPoint. This will include how to format characters, paragraphs, and text boxes.

This course then explains how to insert clip art, images, and shapes into a PowerPoint presentation. You will learn about modifying and editing objects in power point. You will learn about formatting object, grouping objects, arranging objects, and animating objects. You will also learn about adding tables to your presentation. This includes inserting a table from other Microsoft Office Applications. You will also learn about adding charts as well.

This course then wraps up with preparing to deliver your presentation. You will learn how to check your PowerPoint before you present it. By taking this course you will learn the basics of Microsoft PowerPoint. So why wait? Start learning today.
